name: Fusion Alpha Build v0.1
description:
This is the continued development of my entry on a game jam which is now looking to be fully released once development is done.

This build is solely to test out the core gameplay mechanics and to receive feedback so as to improve the gameplay.

The game is still in early stages of development, so a lot is bound to change over time. Many features will be implemented as development continues.

I would love to receive feedback that will help the game to be developed in a way people will be willing to play.

So, ideas on  : Level designs, puzzles on each levels, types of enemies, more gameplay mechanics and the likes would be really appreciated. 

Only Tutorial and Platform Modes are available for testing.

Thanks!!!
